summary: Female Talos Statue, made from sevenbase body, custom texture. Wha?  Female Talos?  Made by request, that is why.
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Sexy Talos Statue
Author: Edhildil
4,28,2014
ver1




[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1236/descriptionn.png[/img]

[color=#ff0000][size=6]This is Just for fun. Not lore Friendly. Made by request.[/size][/color]

This actually seems weird to me and I did not want to make it at first because...well ... lore. But what the heck, why not? Several people wanted

it, so still, why not?

Female Talos Statue, made from sevenbase body, custom texture.

I will not convert this to another body type, sorry, too much of a neck ache.

[img]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/3664/updatesb.png[/img]

If someone wants to convert this go for it.

[img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/4153/requir.png[/img]


Skyrim. That's it.

Â 
[img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2482/installa.png[/img]


Unzip Data file to a temporary location
Check folder paths and make adjustments if needed
copy/paste into Skyrim folder.



Uninstallation:

Delete the included files.


[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8579/creditslo.png[/img]

Sevenity for Sevenbase body

Edhildil for the mesh posing and texture


Tools used:
=======
Blender
Nifscope
GIMP 2


Thanks to all above and to Skyrim Nexus.

[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4562/usaget.png[/img]

If you want to use my meshes in your mod please give the proper credits listed in your mod readme/description. It would also be nice if you sent me a link so I can check out your mod.
author: Edhildil
